coded_answer.p: I received your letter this morning. I am very pleased to hear that I have won first prize in your competition. You can find futherfurther information from me about Camp California in the USA.
First of all I shouldcan go to Camp California only in July because I will start working inat our local leisure centre as a swimming instructerinstructor .

And I would like to choose swimming as an activitiesactivity at the camp. My second chosechoice is painting because I love water colourwatercolour painting and I am a member of the our water colourwatercolour painting club in my town.
I would like to stay in a log cabinscabin because I havehave had bad experiensexperienceexperiences aboutwith tents. I do not like to stay in such a small placespace.
Lastly, I would like to know how much money I should bring with me, and could you give me an clueidea about what I must bring as ain the way of clothes and what I do not need it.
I look forward to hearing from you.

We are all costemerscustomers of the big supermarkets. They have all whatthat we need it. They are a bit far from town but they have huge car parkcar parks. They give us lots of chosechoice to buy what we need it and what we can try for.
Also they givehave lots of salesalesspecial offers foron everything, even you canyou can even join their clubclubs for extra discount. It looklooksseems wonderful does notdoesn't it.?

But when we thingthink about it properlyseriously, shopping is not enjoyable, for example, if you forget something that you need for a salatsalad. You have to go back to thisthe supermarket and find the nearest parking space, then before someone takes the their last fresh lemon for your salatsalad, you must find out where wasis the lemon sectionthe lemon section is, before because they love changeto change the store around again and again. When you get your lemon you have to go to queue to lemons moneypay for the lemon.
AtAs itthis shows, shopping ishas become one of our dislikes, because of the huge supermarkets.
